// This file is auto generated by script
// Date: 25/12/2021 22:02:04

#include <string>
#include <array>

#include "rapidjson/document.h"
#include "rapidjson/writer.h"
#include "rapidjson/stringbuffer.h"

namespace json_autogenerated_classes {

struct Menuitem {
  std::string value;
  std::string onclick;
};

struct Popup {
  std::array<Menuitem, 3> menuitem;
};

struct Menu {
  std::string id;
  std::string value;
  Popup popup;
};

} // namespace json_autogenerated_classes

namespace json_autogenerated_classes {

inline void FromJson(const rapidjson::Value& json, Menuitem& menuitem) {
  menuitem.value = json["value"].GetString();
  menuitem.onclick = json["onclick"].GetString();
}

inline void FromJson(const rapidjson::Value& json, Popup& popup) {
  {
    const auto& values = json["menuitem"].GetArray();
    for (size_t i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
      FromJson(values[i], popup.menuitem[i]);
    }
  }
}

inline void FromJson(const rapidjson::Value& json, Menu& menu) {
  menu.id = json["id"].GetString();
  menu.value = json["value"].GetString();
  FromJson(json["popup"], menu.popup);
}


} // namespace json_autogenerated_classes
